Title: Learn and Grow II: Tilling and Planting
Description:
Okay, now we've got our seeds, it's time to plant them.

First, we have to prepare the soil! You gotta till the soil and break it up to make a nice bed for our little sprouts.

Till those two plots of soil over there, then plant the seeds in them.
ObjectivesText: Till 2 plots of Untilled Soil to create Tilled Soil. Then, use the EZ-Gro Green Cabbage Seeds on 2 plots of Tilled Soil.
CompletionText:
Well, go ahead - bust that soil up and plant the seeds!

You aren't giving up already are you? I need your help!
RewardText:
Nicely done.

Notice how those seeds sprouted immediately? That's part of what makes this valley so ideal for farming - something about the soil here just makes veggies grow like crazy!

The work's not done yet, though.
